org.eclipselabs.emongo.config

Interface ConfigurationProperties


  • public interface ConfigurationProperties
    Author:
    bhunt

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String CLIENT_PID
      The factory PID of the client provider component.
      static java.lang.String ID_FACTORY_PID
      The factory PID of the id factory component.
      static java.lang.String PROP_ALIAS
      The service property key for the database alias when configuring the database provider.
      static java.lang.String PROP_CLIENT_ID
      The service property key for the unique client ID used on both the client provider and database configuration provider.
      static java.lang.String PROP_DATABASE
      The service property key for the MongoDB database name when configuring the database provider.
      static java.lang.String PROP_DATABASE_PID
      The factory PID of the database configuration provider component.
      static java.lang.String PROP_PASSWORD
      The service property key for the MongoDB password when configuring the database provider.
      static java.lang.String PROP_USER
      The service property key for the MongoDB user when configuring the database provider.

    • Field Detail

      • CLIENT_PID

        static final java.lang.String CLIENT_PID
        The factory PID of the client provider component. Use this constant when configuring a client provider component with ConfigurationAdmin.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ID_FACTORY_PID

        static final java.lang.String ID_FACTORY_PID
        The factory PID of the id factory component. Use this constant when configuring an id factory component with ConfigurationAdmin.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PROP_DATABASE_PID

        static final java.lang.String PROP_DATABASE_PID
        The factory PID of the database configuration provider component. Use this constant when configuring a database component with ConfigurationAdmin.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PROP_CLIENT_ID

        static final java.lang.String PROP_CLIENT_ID
        The service property key for the unique client ID used on both the client provider and database configuration provider.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PROP_ALIAS

        static final java.lang.String PROP_ALIAS
        The service property key for the database alias when configuring the database provider.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PROP_DATABASE

        static final java.lang.String PROP_DATABASE
        The service property key for the MongoDB database name when configuring the database provider.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PROP_USER

        static final java.lang.String PROP_USER
        The service property key for the MongoDB user when configuring the database provider. Used for authentication (optional).
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PROP_PASSWORD

        static final java.lang.String PROP_PASSWORD
        The service property key for the MongoDB password when configuring the database provider. Used for authentication (optional).
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
